title-group.article-title: Author Correction: Global warming hiatus contributed weakening of the Mascarene High in the Southern Indian Ocean

contrib-group.aff: ESSO- National Centre for Polar and Ocean Research (NCPOR), Headland Sada, Goa 403 804 India

body.p: Correction to: Scientific Reports 10.1038/s41598-020-59964-7, published online 24 February 2020
This Article contains a typographical error in the Supplementary Information file where the title,
“Weakening of the Mascarene High and its implication to the cross-equatorial winds in the western Indian Ocean”
“Global warming hiatus contributed weakening of the Mascarene High in the Southern Indian Ocean”
“The authors thank Ms Jyoti Jadav, IITM Pune for helpful discussions.”
“The authors thank Ms Jyoti Jadhav, IITM Pune for helpful discussions.”
